channel.title: Death Magnetic
channel.description:
Metallica's new album. What do you think about it? Has Metallica once again proved that they do this for the money or have they listened to the hardcore fans and made something more old school again?
I can't form an opinion just yet, I've just downloaded it and haven't listened to it completely. I'll listen to it on the way to school tommorrow. But what do you guys think about it?

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:12, topic:230166”]Aw cmon, it wasn’t THAT bad Johan

It’s no KillEmAll or Puppets or Lightning, but its better than anything theyve done for leik 10 years…lul[/quote]Obviously it was better, but still not their old “spark”.

Read full topic

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

pk4pk:

Death metal r gay.

Suck my dick.

There are rumors that Guns N Roses have their release of Chinese Democracy planned in November. GNR was my fav band when I was like 12, so I’m looking forward to it!! (yes, GNR should be called ‘the AXL Rose band that fucks over their fans a lot’ but I like his voice)

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @Droid Droid
item.description:
@Droid wrote:

I only like one song from the new album, and I’ve like Metallica for quite a while. This was a disappointed. It makes me worried about the new AC/DC album coming out soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Yea, I already deleted it from my mp3 player. It’s not bad, but certainly not as good as I expect from Metallica. This cd doesn’t have any of those ‘catchy’ intro’s like the unforgiven I, One, Enter Sandman etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Just as bad as all their material after Kill ém All. It was still better than St. Anger, but boring and dull like always. Conclusion: Another sell-out album yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Death Magnetic
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I have two reasons. First, why buy it if I don’t like it? I want to listen to it first and see if I like it. If I don’t, I delete it so I save space on my HD and my mp3 player. Second, it’s to tease Lars Ulrich. He most likely won’t notice it though.

Read full topic
